018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.cli;
019
020import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
021import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.CallableByActionName;
022
023import org.json.JSONArray;
024
025import java.nio.file.Path;
026import java.nio.file.Paths;
027import java.util.logging.Level;
028import java.util.logging.Logger;
029
030/**
031 * Actor that provides log server discovery API to plugins.
032 *
033 * <p>This actor wraps {@link LogServerDiscovery} and exposes its functionality
034 * through the {@link CallableByActionName} interface, making it accessible
035 * to plugins via the actor system.</p>
036 *
037 * <h2>Actions:</h2>
038 * <ul>
039 *   <li>{@code getJdbcUrl} - Get JDBC URL for a database path.
040 *       Returns TCP URL if a matching log server is running, otherwise embedded URL.</li>
041 *   <li>{@code discoverServer} - Discover log server for a database path.
042 *       Returns server info (port, path) if found.</li>
043 * </ul>
044 *
045 * <h2>Example usage in a plugin:</h2>
046 * <pre>{@code
047 * // In plugin's connect method:
048 * IIActorRef<?> logServerApi = system.getIIActor("logServerApi");
049 * ActionResult result = logServerApi.callByActionName("getJdbcUrl", dbPath);
050 * if (result.isSuccess()) {
051 *     String jdbcUrl = result.getResult();
052 *     connection = DriverManager.getConnection(jdbcUrl);
053 * }
054 * }</pre>
055 *
056 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
057 * @since 2.12.0
058 */
059public class LogServerApiActor implements CallableByActionName {
060
061    private static final String CLASS_NAME = LogServerApiActor.class.getName();
062    private static final Logger LOG = Logger.getLogger(CLASS_NAME);
063
064    private final LogServerDiscovery discovery;
065
066    /**
067     * Constructs a new LogServerApiActor.
068     */
069    public LogServerApiActor() {
070        this.discovery = new LogServerDiscovery();
071    }
072
073    @Override
074    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String args) {
075        LOG.entering(CLASS_NAME, "callByActionName", new Object[]{actionName, args});
076        try {
077            ActionResult result = switch (actionName) {
078                case "getJdbcUrl" -> getJdbcUrl(args);
079                case "discoverServer" -> discoverServer(args);
080                default -> new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
081            };
082            LOG.exiting(CLASS_NAME, "callByActionName", result);
083            return result;
084        } catch (Exception e) {
085            ActionResult errorResult = new ActionResult(false, "Error: " + e.getMessage());
086            LOG.logp(Level.WARNING, CLASS_NAME, "callByActionName", "Exception occurred", e);
087            LOG.exiting(CLASS_NAME, "callByActionName", errorResult);
088            return errorResult;
089        }
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * Gets the appropriate JDBC URL for connecting to a database.
094     *
095     * <p>If a log server is running that serves the specified database,
096     * returns a TCP connection URL. Otherwise, returns an embedded mode URL.</p>
097     *
098     * @param args database path (JSON array ["path"] or plain string "path")
099     * @return ActionResult with JDBC URL string
100     */
101    private ActionResult getJdbcUrl(String args) {
102        LOG.entering(CLASS_NAME, "getJdbcUrl", args);
103
104        String dbPathStr = parseDbPath(args);
105        if (dbPathStr == null) {
106            ActionResult result = new ActionResult(false, "Invalid args. Expected: dbPath");
107            LOG.exiting(CLASS_NAME, "getJdbcUrl", result);
108            return result;
109        }
110
111        try {
112            Path dbPath = Paths.get(dbPathStr).toAbsolutePath().normalize();
113            String absolutePath = dbPath.toString();
114
115            // Try to discover a running log server
116            LogServerDiscovery.DiscoveryResult serverResult = discovery.discoverServer(dbPath);
117
118            String jdbcUrl;
119            if (serverResult.isFound()) {
120                // Use TCP connection to the discovered server
121                jdbcUrl = "jdbc:h2:tcp://localhost:" + serverResult.getTcpPort() + "/" + absolutePath;
122                LOG.logp(Level.INFO, CLASS_NAME, "getJdbcUrl",
123                    "Found log server at port {0}, using TCP URL", serverResult.getTcpPort());
124            } else {
125                // No server found, use embedded mode with AUTO_SERVER
126                jdbcUrl = "jdbc:h2:" + dbPathStr + ";AUTO_SERVER=TRUE";
127                LOG.logp(Level.INFO, CLASS_NAME, "getJdbcUrl",
128                    "No log server found, using embedded URL");
129            }
130
131            ActionResult result = new ActionResult(true, jdbcUrl);
132            LOG.exiting(CLASS_NAME, "getJdbcUrl", result);
133            return result;
134
135        } catch (Exception e) {
136            ActionResult result = new ActionResult(false, "Path resolution failed: " + e.getMessage());
137            LOG.logp(Level.WARNING, CLASS_NAME, "getJdbcUrl", "Exception occurred", e);
138            LOG.exiting(CLASS_NAME, "getJdbcUrl", result);
139            return result;
140        }
141    }
142
143    /**
144     * Discovers a log server for the specified database path.
145     *
146     * @param args database path (JSON array ["path"] or plain string "path")
147     * @return ActionResult with server info (port:path) or "not found"
148     */
149    private ActionResult discoverServer(String args) {
150        LOG.entering(CLASS_NAME, "discoverServer", args);
151
152        String dbPathStr = parseDbPath(args);
153        if (dbPathStr == null) {
154            ActionResult result = new ActionResult(false, "Invalid args. Expected: dbPath");
155            LOG.exiting(CLASS_NAME, "discoverServer", result);
156            return result;
157        }
158
159        try {
160            Path dbPath = Paths.get(dbPathStr).toAbsolutePath().normalize();
161            LogServerDiscovery.DiscoveryResult serverResult = discovery.discoverServer(dbPath);
162
163            ActionResult result;
164            if (serverResult.isFound()) {
165                String info = serverResult.getTcpPort() + ":" + serverResult.getDbPath();
166                result = new ActionResult(true, info);
167            } else {
168                result = new ActionResult(true, "not found");
169            }
170            LOG.exiting(CLASS_NAME, "discoverServer", result);
171            return result;
172
173        } catch (Exception e) {
174            ActionResult result = new ActionResult(false, "Discovery failed: " + e.getMessage());
175            LOG.logp(Level.WARNING, CLASS_NAME, "discoverServer", "Exception occurred", e);
176            LOG.exiting(CLASS_NAME, "discoverServer", result);
177            return result;
178        }
179    }
180
181    /**
182     * Parses database path from args.
183     *
184     * @param args JSON array ["path"] or plain string "path"
185     * @return database path string, or null if invalid
186     */
187    private String parseDbPath(String args) {
188        if (args == null || args.trim().isEmpty()) {
189            return null;
190        }
191
192        String trimmedArgs = args.trim();
193        if (trimmedArgs.startsWith("[")) {
194            try {
195                JSONArray jsonArray = new JSONArray(trimmedArgs);
196                if (jsonArray.length() < 1) {
197                    return null;
198                }
199                return jsonArray.getString(0).trim();
200            } catch (Exception e) {
201                return null;
202            }
203        } else {
204            return trimmedArgs;
205        }
206    }
207}
